org.gradoop.examples

Class AbstractRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.examples.AbstractRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractRunner
extends Object
    Base class for example runners.

      • convertDotToPNG

        protected static void convertDotToPNG(String dotFile,
                                      String pngFile)
                               throws IOException
